typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_name as string,
		Currency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_alloc_percentage as decimal(10,0),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
GetFirstRowPerAssetFundCombo select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name = Asset_name,
		Asset_Curency = Currency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per = Asset_alloc_percentage,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB window(over(Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID = Fund_ID),
	asc(Asset_ID, false),
	asc(Fund_ID, false),
	RN = rowNumber()) ~> AnalyticFunctionComputeRowOrder
AnalyticFunctionComputeRowOrder filter(RN==1) ~> GetFirstRowPerAssetFundCombo
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Asset_Name as string,
		Asset_Curency as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_Alloc_Per as decimal(18,2),
		Asset_country as string,
		Fund_Region as string,
		Fund_State as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Name as string,
		Prop_Mgr_Company as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Asset_Name,
		Asset_Curency,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_Alloc_Per,
		Asset_country,
		Fund_Region,
		Fund_State,
		Prop_Mgr_Name,
		Prop_Mgr_Company
	)) ~> StagingDB
